S04ajitsvyu:369: atha rājā ajitaseno jyeṣṭhāmātyam evam āha /
S04ajitsvyu:374: triṃśadyojanāni dīrgheṇa ṣaḍyojanāny ūrdhvāyāṃ saptaratnamayaṃ maṇimuktisaṃcchāditaṃ kuṭikaṃ kāraya /
S04ajitsvyu:377: maṇimuktisaṃcchāditaṃ kārayitvā yena rājā ajitasenas tenopasaṃkrānto rājānam ajitasenam evam āha /
S04ajitsvyu:378: kṛtaṃ mahārāja mayā kuṭikaṃ yādṛśam ājñaptam* /

S04ajitsvyu:381: atha so 'mātyas taṃ caṃkramaṃ kārayitvā yena rājā ajitasenas tenopasaṃkrānto rājānaṃ gāthābhir adhyabhāṣata /
S04ajitsvyu:383: ājñā tvayā yat kṛtapūrvam eva ca /
S04ajitsvyu:388: praṇidhiṃ kṛtaṃ yat tvayam īdṛśaṃ bhave
S04ajitsvyu:391: ājñā kṛtaṃ yat tvaya yādṛśī kṛtā /
S04ajitsvyu:394: atha rājā ajitaseno yena svakā rājadhānī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04ajitsvyu:396: kuṭike niṣaṇṇo vikiraṇaṃ nāma bodhisatvasamādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt* /
S04ajitsvyu:397: anyena keśān anyena nayanāny anyena dantān anyena grīvā anyena bāhū anyena hṛdayam anyenodaram anyenorū anyena jaṅghe anyena pādau samāpanno 'bhūt* /
S04ajitsvyu:398: atha sa rājā ajitasenaḥ saptāhasyātyayena taṃ bhikṣuṃ na paśyati /
S04ajitsvyu:402: atha sa rājā saputro yena sā kuṭikā tenopasaṃkrānto 'bhūt* /
S04ajitsvyu:403: atha sa rājā ajitasenas taṃ bhikṣum ātmabhāvaṃ khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ kṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśayajāto 'bhūt* /
S04ajitsvyu:404: saṃtrastaromakūpajāto vastrāṇi pāṭayan paridevan rudan aśrukaṇṭhaḥ putram evam āha /
S04ajitsvyu:407: atha sa rājakumāraḥ prāṃjaliṃ kṛtvā rājānaṃ gāthābhir adhyabhāṣata /
S04ajitsvyu:410: ātmaghātaṃ karitvā tu niraye tvaṃ gamiṣyasi
S04ajitsvyu:413: na cāyaṃ ghātito yakṣair na bhūtair na ca rākṣasaiḥ /
S04ajitsvyu:417: kalyāṇamitram ayaṃ āsī tava kāraṇam āgatam* /
S04ajitsvyu:421: yo nāma tasya dhāreti nāsau gacchati durgatim* /
S04ajitsvyu:423: atha sa rājakumāras taṃ pitaraṃ gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt* /
S04ajitsvyu:424: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ svakaṃ putram evam āha /
S04ajitsvyu:425: kathaṃ tvaṃ kumāra jānīṣe yad ayaṃ bhikṣuḥ samādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt* /
S04ajitsvyu:427: paśya mahārāja ayaṃ bhikṣur bodhisatvasamādhiṃ samāpannaḥ sarvakleśavinirmukto bhavasāgarapāraṃgataḥ sarvasatvahitārthaṃ ca mārgaṃ darśayate śubham* /
S04ajitsvyu:428: atha sa rājakumāro rājānam evam āha /

S04ajitsvyu:491: atha bhagavān suvarṇavarṇena kāyena vyāmaprabhayā caṃkramate sma /
S04ajitsvyu:492: atha rājā ajitaseno bhagavato rūpavarṇaliṃgasaṃsthānaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrcchitvā dharaṇitale nipatitaḥ /
